allow: Bash(timeout 180 bash -c "while [ ! -f ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\analyze_output.txt'' ] || grep -q ''Analyzing'' ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\analyze_output.txt''; do sleep 2; done; cat ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\analyze_output.txt''")
Bash(timeout 120 bash -c "while [ ! -f .dart_tool/build/generated/eatfast_mobile/lib/shared/models/driver_profile.freezed.dart ]; do sleep 2; done; echo ''Build completed''")

Bash(timeout 60 bash -c "while ! test -f ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\fresh_analyze.txt'' || ! grep -q ''issues found'' ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\fresh_analyze.txt''; do sleep 2; done; cat ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\fresh_analyze.txt'' | tail -5")

Bash(timeout 120 bash -c "while ! grep -q ''Succeeded'' ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\build_runner_output.txt''; do sleep 3; done; tail -10 ''E:\project\Eat Fast App\eatfatsApp\build_runner_output.txt''")
